name: Gold Mine And Infamy
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 47: Stuck In A Loop

Made By: BojoEnderGame & Apsie09

Gold Mine and Infamy is a top-down shooter where you play as a miner with a slight infestation problem! Cobweb laying spiders, acid spitting scorpions and even undead zombified miners caught wind of your ever increasing gold pile, and they want to steal it!

 Protect it at all cost using your trusty boomstick and a couple of explosive barrels!
